description.value:
Frequency once per minute

Trigger You succeed at a check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Tumble Through] or use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Tumbling Strike], and you moved through an enemy's space.

The Mockingbird is a master at running into foes and coming away with their weapons. Mimicking their skill, you strike at a foe's wrist while tumbling past them, weakening their grip. You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Disarm] the enemy whose space you moved through. You can use Acrobatics instead of Athletics for this check.
